About Me

I'm an "old" version of a student (just turned 64), and I mention that not because I'm proud of it, but just to be honest. I've re-entered the role of student for the sake of learning things I don't know, and gaining the corresponding skills that I'll need to be re-employed. I have experience in the field of programming and computing, but much of my experience is antiquated, and therefore irrelevant. Such is the world of IT. No sense in crying about it, I figure. So, here I am, and here's my personal portfolio of relavent learnings and experience in the role off "full-stack" programmer.

Work

Taskmaster Pro

Built With: JavaScript,HTML,CSS,ES6,jQuery,Bootstrap

A task managment tool providing task state management, task archiving, and task cleanup...and all with a stylistic flare. Take a look for yourself.

View Project on GitHub

Pricemart

Built With: JavaScript,HTML,CSS,ES6

A web browser application that compares pricing for items at local retailers, as well as shows the distance from the user to the store so that the user can take into consideration time and travel costs. User can then build shopping lists for each retailer and print or email lists for use at while shopping.

View Project on GitHub

A timed programming quiz.
